description:
These units create great anchor stations on single or multi-pitch routes. These anchors are for use with 3/8in or 10mm bolts, and conform to the 2018 update to CE standards.

  • 316L stainless steel provides excellent corrosion resistance
  • The design offers multiple clip-in points – great for busy stations
  • 3 anti-rotation pins help hold hanger in the intended orientation
name: Fixe 316 SS Chain Anchor With Ring 3/8"
